memo_text:

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $4400.:

* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $3800.:
  * Won Element R at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Widget A at $2200 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 4 items in this auction, with a total profit of $8100.:
